remarks: Equality deduction for restricted universal quantifier.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2017.)
statement:
raleqbidva.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
raleqbidva.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rexeqbidva $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A ps <-> E. x e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
